#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld",&a);
#define ll long long

using namespace std;

string s="",temp;
ll x,y,len;
bool chk(string s1,string s2)
{
	ll len1=s1.length();
	ll len2=s2.length();
	if(len2>len1)
		return false;
	ll i,ptr=len1-1;
	for(i=len2-1;i>=0;i--,ptr--)
	{
		if(s2[i]!=s1[ptr])
		{
			return false;
		}
	}
	return true;
}
ll mul()
{
	ll i,a,carry=0,place=0,num=0;
	len=s.length();
	for(i=0;i<len;i++)
	{
		a=s[i]-'0';
		num=a*x;
		num=num+carry;
		carry=num/10;
		place=num%10;
		s[i]=place+'0';
	}
	return carry;
}
string to_string_(ll a)
{
	string str="";
	while(a>0)
	{
		str+=a%10+'0';
		a=a/10;
	}
	return str;
}
int main()
{
	ll i,t,z,dig,e;
	sl(t)
	for(z=1;z<=t;z++)
	{
		sl(x)
		sl(y)
		s=to_string_(x);
		temp=to_string_(y);
		if(chk(s,temp))
		{
			printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",z,1);
			continue;
		}
		for(e=1;e<=1000000;e++)
		{	
			s=s+to_string_(mul());
		//	cout<<s<<endl;
			if(chk(s,temp))
			{
				break;
			}
		}
		printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",z,e+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
